archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Systems installation / decommissioning [HSIN]
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: The installation, testing, implementation or decommissioning and removal of cabling, wiring, equipment, hardware and associated software, following plans and instructions and in accordance with agreed standards. The testing of hardware and software components, resolution of malfunctions, and recording of results. The reporting of details of hardware and software installed so that configuration management records can be updated.
